post_message: TheBlaze news update with Sara Gonzales

At first glance, the text messages appear to show a disturbing case of cyberbullying: one teen urging another to kill himself. But this was no bully. They were from a 17-year-old girl to her boyfriend, whom she called the love of her life. "You can't think about it. You just have to do it. You said you were gonna do it. Like I don't get why you aren't"
